TopicTitle: Mission issue with Trouble in the void

Articles.Content: I tried checking in the mission editor and it looks like the repair is done on the satellite instead of on vehicle. Is anyone running into that or when they do the crew report on the satellite are they able to use the engines on the main vehicle?
Same here, had to de-orbit the capsule using RCS thrusters. They have a setting for thrusting with the main throttle, but it would be so much simpler with the engine provided.
